attributes.action: Lower grade boundaries for new GCSE English Language and Literature examinations
attributes.background: English Language + Literature no longer include inserts/extract, hence this will increase the students difficulty during the examinations. By lowering the grade boundaries for the new GCSE Language and Literature examinations, this will prevent the current candidates from facing difficulty

rejection.details:
Grade boundaries aren't decided by the Government or Parliament. They are set by exam boards.

You can find out more here:

https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/gcse-and-a-level-exams-how-marking-and-grading-works
